title: K2 Compiler Features Quiz
description: Test your understanding of Kotlin 2.x and the K2 compiler.

questions.question: What is the primary benefit of the K2 compiler in Kotlin 2.x?
options: Significantly faster compilation and improved type inference
questions.explanation: The K2 compiler provides significantly faster compilation (up to 2x) and improved type inference through its new frontend architecture.

questions.question: Which feature allows passing context objects implicitly in Kotlin 2.3?
questions.explanation: Context parameters (Beta in Kotlin 2.3) allow functions to receive context objects implicitly without explicit parameter passing.
